abilityEffect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

effect.en: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
